values:
CALL FOR ARTISTS
&
MUSICIANS, PHOTOGRAPHERS, POETS, WRITERS & ALL CREATORS:

I'm a working artist in Michigan looking for other creators to collaborate on a project that will benefit missing and exploited children. Please visit www.honorwithart.com for complete details. The end result will be an "altered book," which is similar to a scrapbook, filled with original art from artists worldwide. This piece will be auctioned and 100% of all proceeds will go to charities that advocate for missing and exploited children.

I am looking for small, original works of art on paper, or other flat surface, that can be put into the book. Work should be no larger than 10 x 10" and can be as small as a postage stamp, including but not limited to mixed-media works, paintings, ATC's, poetry, cds, stories, blessings, etc.

If interested, please email - mailto:shawnmarie1961@gmail.com or phone - 517-281-9927.

Deadline for art submissions - June 2007

Art should be sent to: 

Shawn Marie Hardy,
Our Children: Honor With Art,
2260 Park Lane #2,
Holt, Michigan, 48842.

I'm looking forward to the Bluesfest here in Old Town, Lansing tonight.  It'll probably be the last big bash here before the snow flies.  But I woke up after only 4 hours of sleep and I stayed in bed too long so I have a major caffeine headache today. And I'm tired. My daughter gave me a nice back rub and here I sit with my coffee at my side.  Until August I didn't need caffeine - I had been off of it for 2 1/2 years.  When I went to my favorite coffee shop in San Francisco I readdicted myself - it was well worth it.  

I'm trying to get a couple new pieces done this weekend - gotta start selling again.

It's 4:00 a.m. and I can barely see anymore so I'm off to bed.  Just started playing around here tonight and wanted to post something - a hello - anything.  So hello, goodnight, good morning, etc. I will return soon
